thread.section_title: Timhotel Palais Royal Louvre - UPDATED 2016 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very well positioned, very quiet place
thread.title_full: Very well positioned, very quiet place - Review of Timhotel Palais Royal Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: OanaUrdea
title: Very well positioned, very quiet place
text:
Price vs quality - ok, booking via booking.com,we received a significant price reduction.
Cleanliness - ok, possibility to have tea in the room.
Quiet hotel - perfect
Close to Bourse and Pyramides metro stations, easy to reach.
